document.title: Transforming Text: Finding the Poem Within
document.abstract: This essay illustrates creative ways for students to re-envision a page of text in order to discover multiple meanings through the integration of visual art and poetry.
document.publication-title: The Journal of the Assembly for Expanded Perspectives on Learning

Deborah F. Carrington is Associate Professor of Education at James Madison University in Harrisonburg, VA. She teaches courses in creativity and arts in education and other teacher preparation courses. Her current research focuses on supporting creativity in the classroom.
